params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.backup
params.description: Required. The backup to update. backup.name, and the fields to be updated as specified by update_mask are required. Other fields are ignored. Update is only supported for the following fields: * backup.expire_time.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. A mask specifying which fields (e.g. expire_time) in the Backup resource should be updated. This mask is relative to the Backup resource, not to the request message. The field mask must always be specified; this prevents any future fields from being erased accidentally by clients that do not know about them.
